data.message: eminem u're the best white rapper of all time,fastest rapper

replies.message: Hes the best rapper out of everyone...not just white rappers

White, black, yellow, blue, whatever!

Just sign this petition for him to come back to the UK for another tour, could be your last or only chance to see him live!!!!

u can't just pull up raceisum'z .....we all just <3 him
